Description: Reverend Guitar - Shade Balderose Condition: Shade Balderose signature in excellent shape! Serial Number: 28574 Weight: 7.14lbs The Shade Balderose Signature guitar is a mean, green, fighting machine stacked with Railhammer pickups that are meant to drive your tone into the brutal and complex realm of Shade's band, Code Orange. It features an aerodynamically slim korina body with a 3-piece korina set neck and ebony fingerboard. The reverse headstock adds another unique touch, as well as the stealthy Army Green satin finish. It features some of Reverend's go-to components, such as their pin-lock tuners, boneite nut, and bass contour knob. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Korina Solid Body Body Color/Finish: Army Green/Satin Neck Wood: 3-Piece Korina Neck Profile: Medium Oval Neck Radius: 12" Neck Joint: Set Neck Fingerboard: Ebony Fingerboard Inlays: Block Frets: 22 Medium Jumbo Nut: Boneite Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Reverend Pin-Lock Scale Length: 24-3/4" Bridge: Tune-O-Matic with Stoptail Pickups: Chisel Bridge, Hyper Vintage Neck Controls: Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-Way Jack Location: Side Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Not Included Country Of Origin: South Korea Switching: 3-Way Pickup Selector: P1 - Bridge Pickup P2 - Bridge & Neck Pickup P3 - Neck Pickup
Title: Reverend Shade Balderose Signature - Army Green - Premium Preowned
